Name: WAR FACTORY
About the game: Build and manage your own weapon factory. Hire workers and buy machinery to produce weapons. Fullfill contracts and grow your brand. Take part in a conflict and fight against the invasion force. FEATURES Build and organize a factory. Hire workers Research weapons Make deals and accept contracts Grow your reputation Manage inventory Equip your squad and fight battles
